activities: Our company sells software within the EU and a portion of this software may collect PII as part of logging in so as to use such software.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Users of our software usually ID themselves by how to contact them, including mailing address and phone numbers.
privacyprograms: We follow the Privacy Act of 1974 and the SafeHarbor standards.  We self-certify that we follow these standards, we make our SafeHarbor Privacy and Legal docs available to anyone wishing a copy of it and we are signed up with the American Arbitration Association for help is resolving any SafeHarbor issues.
recoursemech: We use the American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor program) as our independent recourse mechanism
